column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We started our anniversary celebration with brunch here
column2: I've brought my family and friends here
column3: I've ordered take-out more times than I care to admit and frankly
column4: if it wasn't for this global pandemic
column5: I would've been here almost every weekend. Both brunch and dinner are a total success
column6: the service is always so friendly
column7: the sangrias are spot-on and the ham croquetas? Yeah
column8: I'm the table with at least 3 orders.
